title: Marlon Wayans Interview and More
itunes:title: Marlon Wayans Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 3/6- Today on the show we had comedian/ actor Marlon Wayans stop by where he spoke about his new Netflix special "Woke- ish", reboots and more. Moreover, Charlamagne also gave "Donkey of the Day" to Terry Bryant, the man responsible for stealing Frances McDormand's Oscar and bragging about it on social media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 3/6- Today on the show we had comedian/ actor Marlon Wayans stop by where he spoke about his new Netflix special "Woke- ish", reboots and more. Moreover, Charlamagne also gave "Donkey of the Day" to Terry Bryant, the man responsible for stealing Frances McDormand's Oscar and bragging about it on social media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
